first_micromorgi_gift_leaders_label: 1st to be gifted from a Friend that has Micro Morgis
active_subscriptions_label: Number of Friends gifting me Morgis
leaders_sending_micromorgi_last_seven_da: Number of Friends gifting me Micro Morgis last 7 days
logins_streak_description: Get up to 10 points when you login every day to Morgi. If you miss one day of logging in, the amount will be reset.
photos_description: Receive 2 points for every photo you’re uploading to your profile for up to 20 points!
videos_description: Create and upload a winning video that let’s your personality shine for potential Friends!
has_description_description: Add a genuine and honest self- description that stands you from the rest!
joined_telegram_bot_description: Connect to the Telegram Notifications bot to receive push notifications about payments and messages received from your Friends, even when offline!
first_micromorgi_gift_leaders_descriptio: Receive 3 points (up to 30 points) for every Friend that gifts you Micro Morgis.
leaders_referred_description: Send a personal invitation to a Friend you know and open a free chat channel with them where they can gift you later with Morgis and Micro Morgis! Receive 10 points for each referred Friend for up to 30 points.
active_subscriptions_description: Morgi will aggregate the amount of active gifting Friends to every Rookie and divide them into different deciles (10*{1/10}) according to their results, i.e., if 3 Friends are gifting you, you might be in the third decile and you’ll receive 6 points.
leaders_sending_micromorgi_last_seven_da: Morgi will aggregate the amount of Friends that gifted Micro Morgis in the last 7 days from the previous day to all Rookies, and divide them into different deciles (10*{1/10}) according to their results, i.e., if 3 Friends have gifted you Micro Morgis in the past 7 days, you might be in the third decile and you’ll receive 6 points.
avg_subscriptions_period_description: Morgi will calculate the average gifting connection time period for all the Rookies that one of their connections had ended, and divide them into different deciles (10{1/10}) according to their results, i.e., if you have an average gifting connection time period of 25 days, that might put you in the 10th decile and you will receive 4 points. If you have less than 3 gifting connections, you will always be in the 6th decile. *If none of your gifting connections had ended and you have more than 3 opened connections, you will be in the first decile and receive 40 points.
avg_first_response_time_seconds_descript: Morgi will calculate the average response time to every Friend for their first ever message for all the Rookies and divide them into different deciles (10*{1/10}) according to their results, i.e., if you have an average first ever response time of 02:45 mins, that might put you in the 8th decile and you will receive 12 points. *The only way to stay very responsive to your Friends is to use the Telegram Notifications Bot!
